Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult.” Early Years picks up the first decade of his life, when Miyazawa is exposed to a series of harsh events.
